law.catch_line: The Commissioner shall approve Medicare supplement policies that include benefits in addition to the...
law.text:
The Commissioner shall approve Medicare supplement policies that include benefits in addition to the minimum benefits listed in § 15-906(a) of this subtitle if the Medicare supplement policies and benefits:
conform with the federal Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1990 and the Medicare Supplement Insurance Minimum Standards Model Act and any regulations under the Model Act adopted by the National Association of Insurance Commissioners; and
comply with the applicable provisions of this article.
